sec.title: Tramming stand
sec.p: Where a ride-on operatorâ€™s position is provided on the machine for the purposes of tramming the machine, it shall be provided with:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: a grab rail for the operator stability when riding. This grab rail shall be capable of withstanding a horizontal force of 900 N applied in line with the operator's standing position, without permanent deformation;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: if the rig is not intended to be trammed from the ground, there shall be provisions to prevent tramming from the ground.
